media:group.media:title: Titles & Thumbnails
media:group.media:description:
Titles & thumbnails are the first things your audience sees when deciding what to watch. In this video, we cover things to keep in mind when designing thumbnails, tips for writing titles, and how to use analytics to see how these elements are performing. 

For more info check out this Help Center article:
https://support.google.com/youtube/answer/12340300?hl=en

00:00 Title and Thumbnail Overview
00:30 Thumbnails: Before You Design
01:56 Thumbnails: Design Tips
03:17 Titles: Types & Tips
05:04 Using Analytics to Track Performance & Find Inspiration
